ai-patthana21.6:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.6:1.1_0: Not unskillful qualities even when something is skillful.
ai-patthana21.6:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.6:3.1_0: One who has not declared these things.
ai-patthana21.6:3.1_1: It’s not for the sake of defilement, not for the sake of answering.
ai-patthana21.6:3.1_2: The sections on two root items,
ai-patthana21.6:3.1_3: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.6:3.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
